prompt: Design a quiz page with a clean, light theme and teal accents. Feature a header with the title 'General Knowledge' in a bold, teal font on a white background with a thin teal border. Show a progress indicator as 'Question 3 of 10' with a circular progress bar to the left of the title. Display the question 'What is the largest planet in our solar system?' in a 22pt bold font inside a teal-bordered card with rounded corners. Present four answer options ('Jupiter', 'Saturn', 'Earth', 'Mars') as cards with teal hover effects, arranged in a vertical list with 16px spacing. Place a 'Next Question' button at the bottom, styled with a teal gradient and white text. Use 20px padding, ensure the layout is scrollable, and center elements vertically.
